explains: adj. 厚颜无耻的；无所顾忌的；黄铜制的；黄铜色的；（声音）响而刺耳的
vt. 厚着脸皮；硬着头皮

sentences.en: Now that everyone knew the truth, the only thing to do was to brazen it out.
sentences.cn: 既然大家都知道真相了，只好硬着头皮撑过去。

sentences.en: She had become brazen about the whole affair.
sentences.cn: 她对整件事已经不感到羞耻了。

sentences.en: They're quite brazen about their bisexuality, it doesn't worry them.
sentences.cn: 他们对自己的双性恋无所顾忌, 这并不使他们担心。
